text: anaknea del phiesakhluon knong phlauv a l laoh ke brakadchea nung chuobabrateah now leu phendei nih nouv kanleng chrokkaon cheachraen ning leaph sakkar da saambaur beb . haey anaknea del chakchenh pi lomnow dthan robsa ke knongnam chea anakphiesakhluon daembi a l laoh ning anakneasar robsa trong kraoyomk sechakdeislab ka kaetmean champoh ke( knong pel thveudamnaer) brakd nasa phalbony robsa ke ku sthetnow cheamuoy a l laoh . a l laoh mha aphytosa mha anet sraleanh
